title: "Storm Watch Daily"
content: **Storm Watch Daily** is your go-to source for the latest weather news and updates. Our team of expert meteorologists provides up-to-the-minute information on severe weather conditions, including thunderstorms, hurricanes, tornadoes, and more. With our storm tracking tools and real-time radar maps, you can stay ahead of the storm and be prepared for whatever Mother Nature has in store. Whether you're a weather enthusiast or just looking to stay informed, Storm Watch Daily has everything you need to stay safe and stay ahead of the storm.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a stormy sky with lightning bolts for a weather or news website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
